description: This table contains web-based chart system-related data items that are stored in the Patient (EPT) master file. These items generally relate to web-based chart system account activation and account status, and also include the last verification date for different types of patient information that can be verified through the web-based chart system.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ACCESS_CODE
columns.description: The patient's current web-based chart system access code. This value is checked when a patient attempts to log in to the web-based chart system for the first time.

columns.name: PAT_ACCESS_CODE_TM
columns.description: This is a timestamp indicating when the access code in field PAT_ACCESS_CODE was created.

columns.name: PAT_ACCESS_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The access code status category number for the patient. 0 corresponds to "Not Used". 1 corresponds to "Used".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Used


Used

columns.name: MYCHART_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The web-based chart system status category number for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Activated


Inactivated


Pending Activation


Non Standard MyChart Status


Patient Declined


Activation Code Generated, but Disabled

columns.name: ACCESSCODE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The access code generation status category number for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


force


Nonexist


used


expired


okexist

columns.name: DEACT_ACCT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient's web-based chart system account is deactivated. Y indicates that the account is deactivated. N or a null value indicates that the account is active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CODE_FOR_PROXY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the access code was generated for a proxy to use on behalf of the patient. Y indicates that the access code was generated. N or a null value indicates that the access code was not generated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DEACT_ACCT_YN

columns.name: MYCHART_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date (if one has been set) of the web-based chart system account. When this date is reached, the web-based chart system user is no longer allowed to login to the system.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system patient account.

columns.name: LAST_MERGE_FROM
columns.description: If this patient record is the destination of a previous merging, and the source record has web-based chart system activity, then this item stores the time instant of the merging.

columns.name: ALT_WEBSTE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The alternate website activation status category number for the patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MYCHART_STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: MYC_PAT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The web-based chart system patient type category number for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart Only Patient for Proxy Access

columns.name: DEM_VERIF_DT
columns.description: Date of last demographics verification by patient or his/her proxy from MyChart.

columns.name: INS_VERIF_DT
columns.description: Date of last insurance verification by patient or his/her proxy from MyChart

columns.name: R_E_L_PAT_VERIF_DT
columns.description: The date when race, ethnicity, and language information was last verified by the patient online using the patient portal.

columns.name: PCP_PAT_VERIF_DT
columns.description: The date that patients last used Welcome to verify and/or update their primary care provider.

columns.name: HCA_PAT_VERIF_DT
columns.description: The date that the patient last used MyChart or Welcome to verify and/or update their health care agents.

columns.name: PAT_MYC3_ENR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Returns the status of enrollment in MyChart Care Companion.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Enrolled

columns.name: LAST_LABS_VIEW_DTTM
columns.description: The last time when the patient or proxies viewed patient's result list (including IP results) in MyChart.
